entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:40 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
